nodes.text: The Indigo Tower was a restaurant on Coruscant which was modeled after the famous Skysitter Restaurant. In 43.5 ABY, it was visited by journalist Javis Tyrr, who was following Jedi Knight Jaina Solo and Imperial Remnant Head of State Jagged Fel in hopes of eavesdropping on them. However, they foiled his efforts by using one of the establishment's private dining rooms and leaving Karn Valanti and Lina Zev to act as their doubles as they covertly left the Indigo Tower.
